snippet: Charges against the defendant, Dharun Ravi, include invasion of privacy, bias intimidation, and trying to cover up his actions by tampering with evidence and with a witness.
abstract: Prosecutors make their final arguments to jury in case against former Rutgers University student Dharun Ravi, accused of setting up webcam to spy on roomate Tyler Clementi during intimate encounter with another man; Clementi later committed suicide.
lead_paragraph: Charges against the defendant, Dharun Ravi, include invasion of privacy, bias intimidation, and trying to cover up his actions by tampering with evidence and with a witness.

headline.seo: Lawyers in Rutgers Dorm Spying Trial Make Final Presentations
headline.main: Lawyers Give Final Presentations in Dorm Spying Case
headline.print_headline: Final Arguments by Lawyers as Dorm Spying Trial Winds Up

keywords.value: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
